name: Master Yi
title: the Wuju Bladesman
lore: Master Yi has tempered his body and sharpened his mind, so that thought and action have become almost as one. Though he chooses to enter into violence only as a last resort, the grace and speed of his blade ensures resolution is always swift. As one of the last living practitioners of the Ionian art of Wuju, Yi has devoted his life to continuing the legacy of his peopleâ€”scrutinizing potential new disciples with the Seven Lenses of Insight to identify the most worthy among them.
blurb: Master Yi has tempered his body and sharpened his mind, so that thought and action have become almost as one. Though he chooses to enter into violence only as a last resort, the grace and speed of his blade ensures resolution is always swift. As one of...
allytips: If you're in a lane against ranged players, leveling up Meditate can allow you to stay in the lane longer and gain levels faster than they will.
Wuju Style is very strong early for last hitting minions.
Try using Alpha Strike on a minion in front of an enemy champion so you are placed at a safe distance at the end of the spell.
enemytips: Meditate is an effective method of healing damage over time, but Master Yi is susceptible to coordinated team ganks early in the game.
If Master Yi tries to farm with Alpha Strike, hit him a few times so he has to use mana with Meditate to heal.
Although Master Yi cannot be slowed while using Highlander, other disables can stop him in his tracks.

riot_spell_q.name: Alpha Strike
riot_spell_q.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Master Yi becomes untargetable and teleports to rapidly strike enemies near his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit after {{ e8 }} hits.

Alpha Strike can critically strike for {{ f1 }} additional damage.
Monsters take {{ e3 }} bonus damage.
Repeat strikes instantly deal {{ falloffmultiplier*100 }}% damage.
Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown by {{ e7 }} second.

riot_spell_w.name: Meditate
riot_spell_w.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}% and restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health over {{ f1.-1 }} seconds. This healing is increased by up to {{ e0 }}% based on missing health.

In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

Meditate's damage reduction is halved against structures.

riot_spell_e.name: Wuju Style
riot_spell_e.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Basic attacks deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Highlander
riot_spell_r.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by {{ rcooldownrefund*100 }}%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ rmsbonus }}%, Attack Speed by {{ rasbonus }}%, and grants immunity to slows for {{ rduration }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ rkillassistextension }} seconds.

riot_spell_i.name: Double Strike
riot_spell_i.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Double Strike
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} With every fourth [[basic attack]] (within 4 seconds of each other), '''Master Yi''' strikes twice, the second strike dealing {{as|50% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{As|physical damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: The second strike applies [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} dealing {{as|{{critical damage|50|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: If '''Master Yi's''' primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The fourth attack that triggers ''Double Strike'' will both reset the counter and add a stack for the next ''Double Strike'' activation.
** The next ''Double Strikes'' will happen at every third basic attack because of this.

wikia_skill_q1._preamble:
<!--Edit this value to update the entire ability description
-->{{#vardefine:r|100}}<!--Primary Damage Ratio
-->{{#vardefine:b1|25}}<!--Primary Base Rank 1 Damage
-->{{#vardefine:b5|165}}<!--Primary Base Rank 5 Damage
-->{{#vardefine:m1|75}}<!--Monster Rank 1 Damage
-->{{#vardefine:m5|175}}<!--Monster Rank 5 Damage
-->{{#vardefine:l|25}}<!--Master Yi's Lesser % Damage
-->{{{{{1<noinclude>|Ability data</noinclude>}}}|Alpha Strike|{{{2|}}}|{{{3|}}}|{{{4|}}}|{{{5|}}}
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} and, after {{fd|0.225}} seconds, marks his target and then moves to mark the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring up to 3 times, once every {{fd|0.225}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Upon finishing marking, or if there're no other enemies in range, he {{tip|blink|re-appears}} after a {{fd|0.15}} second delay in front of his target and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all marked enemies, increased against [[monster]]s. If his target dies during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}} to {{#var:b5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AD)}}|Monster Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}}+{{#var:m1}} to {{#var:b5}}+{{#var:m5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AD)}}|Monster Bonus Damage|{{ap|{{#var:m1}} to {{#var:m5}}}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description3: If there are no other un-marked enemies in range, he may strike the same enemies again, dealing {{fd|{{#var:l}}}}% damage instantly.
wikia_skill_q1.name: {{ap
wikia_skill_q1.description4: '''Alpha Strike's''' primary and lesser damage can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|60|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{as|{{critical damage|{{#expr:60*{{#var:l}}/100}}|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} respectively.
wikia_skill_q1.description5: Basic attacks reduce ''Alpha Strike's'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 1 second.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Alpha Strike's'' cooldown reduction applies on structures but not when ''Master Yi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Master Yi'' can use [[summoner spell]]s during ''Alpha Strike''.
* When '''Master Yi''' bounces from a unit it will grant {{tip|sight|vision}} around it. It will always grant vision around the primary target even if he doesn't bounce off it. This vision will not reveal [[brush|brushes]].
* ''Alpha Strike's'' damage is calculated the moment the mark is placed. Because of this it is possible to inflict differing amounts of damage if '''Master Yi''' changes his {{as|AD}} in the middle of ''Alpha Strike''.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} during ''Alpha Strike's'' cast, ''Alpha Strike'' will not end, but will instead last as if it had kept bouncing around targets.
* '''Master Yi''' will follow his primary target's movement even if it {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} or becomes {{tip|invisibility|invisible}}.
* ''Alpha Strike's'' primary damage applies after '''Master Yi''' leaves {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}} and thus can attract turret aggro.
* ''Alpha Strike'' counts as movement for the purposes of {{nie|Energized Strike}}, {{nie|Dreadnought}} and {{nie|Echo}}.
* If the primary target is a champion, '''Master Yi''' will basic attack that champion when ''Alpha Strike'' finishes, but he cannot buffer ''{{ai|Highlander}}'' or ''{{ai|Wuju Style}}''.
* If the primary target is a minon or monster, '''Master Yi''' can buffer either ''{{ai|Highlander}}'' or ''{{ai|Wuju Style}}'', but he will not automatically basic attack the target.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Meditate
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|channels}} for up to 4 seconds, {{tip|healing}} himself every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% missing health}}|health}}.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Minimum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15 to 55}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15*2 to 55*2}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Minimum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8 to 55*8}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Maximum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8*2 to 55*8*2}} {{as|(+ 200% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: While channeling, '''Master Yi''' reduces incoming damage, halved against [[turret]]s, pauses {{ais|Wuju Style|Master Yi}} and {{ais|Highlander|Master Yi}} duration, and grants one stack of {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}} per second.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Meditate's'' healing amount updates dynamically as he heals himself, making ''Master Yi'' heal for less as his current health increases.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Wuju Style
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi's''' basic attacks deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} for 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Wuju Style'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Master Yi's'' previous orders.
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage does not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} nor does it affect structures.
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage cannot be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} but can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} and/or miss if ''Master Yi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Highlander
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} reduce the '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} of '''Master Yi's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] by 70%.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} For 7 seconds, '''Master Yi''' is {{tip|ghosted}}, gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, and becomes [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to {{tip|slow|slows}} and {{tip|cripple|cripples}}.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{as|{{ap|30 to 80}}%|attack speed}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|35 to 55}}%}}
wikia_skill_r1.description3: While active, champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} extend the duration of ''Highlander'' by 7 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Highlander'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Master Yi's'' previous orders.
* ''Highlander's'' slow immunity extends to all slows including abilities with multiple effects (e.g {{tip|fear}}, {{tip|charm}}) and attack speed slows. The abilities themselves won't be negated, but the slows will.
* Without considering enemy respawns, {{ri|Presence of Mind}} can make ''Highlander's'' duration exceed its cooldown. For this ''Master Yi'' needs to:
** Kill 4 champions and have at least {{fd|31.4}}% cooldown reduction.
** Kill 5 champions and have at least {{fd|1.2}}% cooldown reduction.
* There're two situations that can happen if '''Master Yi''' uses ''Highlander'' while ''Highlander's'' buff is active.
** If the buff's duration is under 7 seconds, the buff refreshes to 7 seconds.
** If the buff's duration is above 7 seconds nothing happens.
